name: Warmth
description:
Spread a trail of warmth throughout the world in this wholesome casual puzzle game! Create a trail of campfires and torches to make sure that no one is left alone under the cold starry night sky.

Features:

  • No language barrier; apart from the title, the game does not include any text whatsoever for maximum inclusiveness :)
  • 64 levels of puzzlesolving fun, with additional level packs in the making
  • 3 different types of family members to be overjoyed by the presence of a nice warm fire - grandma, little brother & doggo, as well as the everfrosty snowman
  • 2 different ways of creating hotspots
